Package frc.robot.limelight

Class LimelightConfig

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.limelight.LimelightConfig
public class LimelightConfig extends Object
Limelight class that contains all robot configurable options.

    • aprilTagOffset

      public edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Translation3d aprilTagOffset
      Point of interest offset in Meters from AprilTag center, could be offset from tag to goal. More information here. https://docs.limelightvision.io/docs/docs-limelight/pipeline-apriltag/apriltag-3d#point-of-interest-tracking

    • streamMode

      public frc.robot.limelight.LimelightConfig.StreamMode streamMode

  • Method Details

    • withAprilTagOffset

      public LimelightConfig withAprilTagOffset(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Translation3d offset)
      Set the offset from the AprilTag that is of interest. More information here. https://docs.limelightvision.io/docs/docs-limelight/pipeline-apriltag/apriltag-3d#point-of-interest-tracking
      Parameters:
      offset - Translation3d offset.
      Returns:
      LimelightConfig for chaining.

    • withAprilTagOverride

      public LimelightConfig withAprilTagOverride(List<Double> override)
      Set the AprilTag override of which the Limelight is supposed to track.
      Parameters:
      override - List of Doubles containing the AprilTag ID's to track.
      Returns:
      LimelightConfig for chaining.

    • withCameraOffset

      public LimelightConfig withCameraOffset(edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose3d robotToCamera)
      Offset of the Limelight relative to robot center.
      Parameters:
      robotToCamera - Pose3d in Meters, with Rotation3d which will be converted to Degrees.
      Returns:
      LimelightConfig for chaining.

      public LimelightConfig withStreamMode(frc.robot.limelight.LimelightConfig.StreamMode streamMode)

      Parameters:
